Monday April 28, 2024



Figuring out how to download files from my phone to my computer using Google Takeout. Its dumb, but at least I will have my photos on my computer with minimal google intervention.
Hopefully it works
I still have yet to diagnose what is preventing my code to be pushed to Neocities, but I cannot let it keep me from writing.
I wonder how long it will take me to fix it....

I need to continue to write. There is so much in my head, and I haven't got a place to put it.

I suppose I could look over my physical writings, workshop them, and post.

I also have film photos to post.



It's the relief that sets in, as you remove one bowl, one small plate, and one big plate from the set. Accepting you have no need for three bowls, three small plates, and three big plates. And maybe one day, you will only need one bowl, one small plate, and one big plate. Realizing that you are so lonely, so desperate to fill you time, that you won't mind washing your three single dishes, and your three single utensils every night. It keeps you busy, and your mind off of why you only have one bowl, one small plate, and one big plate


(I bet I could get away with no big plates too....)

-e

Thursday April 10, 2025



Who my computer thinks I am, is part of who I am.

-e
